title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: Enhancing Chinese Reading Proficiency Using Visual Word Boundary Cues

context.prior_knowledge: Recognition of at least 50 basic Chinese characters, ability to decode simple word-level sentences
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can read sentences with ten or more words at over 80% accuracy using visual word boundary markers (color/spacing).
Students can improve reading comprehension by 30% by applying sequential eye-movement patterns based on EMHMM analysis.
Students can achieve over 90% problem-solving accuracy under various word boundary marker conditions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
